headline: Crown Castle stock falls after CEO termination
summary: Crown Castle (CCI) shares are trading in the red after the company announced it terminated its president and CEO, Steven Moskowitz. Market Domination hosts Julie Hyman and Josh Lipton discuss the news and the stock's movement. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

headline: Crown Castle Stock Drops on CEO Termination After Under 1 Year at Helm
summary: Crown Castle shares fell in intraday trading Tuesday after the provider of towers and other communications infrastructure announced it was firing Steven Moskowitz as its CEO after less than a year at the helm.

raw.headline: Crown Castle Stock Drops on CEO Termination After Under 1 Year at Helm
raw.summary: Crown Castle shares fell in intraday trading Tuesday after the provider of towers and other communications infrastructure announced it was firing Steven Moskowitz as its CEO after less than a year at the helm.

headline: Carvana upgrade, Crown Castle shakeup, Wynn Resorts: Market Minute
summary: There is a lot happening on Wall Street on Tuesday. Here are some of the stocks on the move. Carvana (CVNA) received an upgrade to Overweight at Morgan Stanley. Crown Castle (CCI) announced CEO Steven Moskowitz was terminated. A search is underway for a new leader for the company. Billionaire investor Tilman Fertitta increase his stake in Wynn Resorts (WYNN). Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.
